question:
Which among the following statements is/are correct about Livestock Ranching?
  1. Livestock ranching can be possibly developed in areas of plains and plateaus only.
  2. Flat-topped highlands provide excellent pastures with plentiful supply of grazing.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: Livestock ranching is done in areas of all kinds of terrain-plains, plateaus, hills and mountains, in lowlands as well as highlands. Highland regions above tree line have excellent pastures. Flat-topped highlands provide excellent pastures with plentiful supply of grazing.
